/Users/delphine/Development/SVN/emeraldion.it/zelda/node_modules/gulp-sass/node_modules/node-sass/node_modules/node-gyp/gyp/data/win/large-pdb-shim.cc

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 // Copyright (c) 2013 Google Inc. All rights reserved.
00002 // Use of this source code is governed by a BSD-style license that can be
00003 // found in the LICENSE file.
00004 
00005 // This file is used to generate an empty .pdb -- with a 4KB pagesize -- that is
00006 // then used during the final link for modules that have large PDBs. Otherwise,
00007 // the linker will generate a pdb with a page size of 1KB, which imposes a limit
00008 // of 1GB on the .pdb. By generating an initial empty .pdb with the compiler
00009 // (rather than the linker), this limit is avoided. With this in place PDBs may
00010 // grow to 2GB.
00011 //
00012 // This file is referenced by the msvs_large_pdb mechanism in MSVSUtil.py.
